headline.main: In the Luminous 'La La Land,' a Shot in the Arm for Movies
headline.print_headline: In the Luminous 'La La Land,' a Shot in the Arm for Movies

docs.snippet: Movies aren't what they were. I'll wait for it on Netflix. Television is so much better right now....
docs.lead_paragraph: Movies aren't what they were. I'll wait for it on Netflix. Television is so much better right now.

headline.main: In Historic Move, California Expands Overtime to Farmworkers
headline.print_headline: In Historic Move, California Expands Overtime to Farmworkers

docs.snippet: Farmworkers in the nation's largest agricultural state will be entitled to the same overtime pay as most other hourly workers under a law that California Gov. Jerry Brown said Monday that he had signed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Farmworkers in the nation's largest agricultural state will be entitled to the same overtime pay as most other hourly workers under a law that California Gov. Jerry Brown said Monday that he had signed.

headline.main: US: No Formal Request From Philippines to Remove Military
headline.print_headline: US: No Formal Request From Philippines to Remove Military

docs.snippet: The State Department says the Philippines has not formally requested the removal of U.S. military personnel after its president said he wanted American forces out of his country's south and blamed the U.S. for inflaming Muslim insurgencies in the ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The State Department says the Philippines has not formally requested the removal of U.S. military personnel after its president said he wanted American forces out of his country's south and blamed the U.S. for inflaming Muslim insurgencies in the region.

headline.main: Broncos' Marshall Unfazed After Losing 2nd Endorsement
headline.print_headline: Broncos' Marshall Unfazed After Losing 2nd Endorsement

docs.snippet: Evaporating endorsements and burning T-shirts won't deter Broncos linebacker Brandon Marshall from continuing to kneel during the national anthem in support of Colin Kaepernick's protest of social injustices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Evaporating endorsements and burning T-shirts won't deter Broncos linebacker Brandon Marshall from continuing to kneel during the national anthem in support of Colin Kaepernick's protest of social injustices.

headline.main: California First U.S. State to Promise Overtime to Farmworkers
headline.print_headline: California First U.S. State to Promise Overtime to Farmworkers

docs.snippet: California will become the first U.S. state to require farmers to pay overtime to field workers and fruit pickers under a bill signed on Monday by Democratic Governor Jerry Brown....
docs.lead_paragraph: California will become the first U.S. state to require farmers to pay overtime to field workers and fruit pickers under a bill signed on Monday by Democratic Governor Jerry Brown.

headline.main: Fight Over the Holocaust Explored in Movie 'Denial'
headline.print_headline: Fight Over the Holocaust Explored in Movie 'Denial'

docs.snippet: "Denial" is the true story of a Jewish woman who had to prove in court that the Holocaust had taken place, but it also has a timely message for present day society, according to director Mick Jackson....
docs.lead_paragraph: "Denial" is the true story of a Jewish woman who had to prove in court that the Holocaust had taken place, but it also has a timely message for present day society, according to director Mick Jackson.

headline.main: Virginia Governor Defends Latest Felons' Voting Rights Plan
headline.print_headline: Virginia Governor Defends Latest Felons' Voting Rights Plan

docs.snippet: Virginia Gov. Terry McAuliffe's administration urged the state's highest court on Monday to reject Republican lawmakers' latest attempt to strip the voting rights of thousands of felons who have completed their sentences....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Gov. Terry McAuliffe's administration urged the state's highest court on Monday to reject Republican lawmakers' latest attempt to strip the voting rights of thousands of felons who have completed their sentences.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Announces Code of Conduct for Forensic Labs
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Announces Code of Conduct for Forensic Labs

docs.snippet: The Justice Department on Monday announced a new code of professional responsibility for its forensic science laboratories and also cautioned its examiners and prosecutors to use restraint in discussing the strength of their findings....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Justice Department on Monday announced a new code of professional responsibility for its forensic science laboratories and also cautioned its examiners and prosecutors to use restraint in discussing the strength of their findings.
